name: Worm Excavation League
description:
This is a local two player game! You need a buddy to play.

Controls:
Player 1 - A S D
Player 2 - ⬅⬇➡
How to play:
- Dig and move with the control keys.
- Get diamonds and gems to dig and move faster
- If the worm is on your side of the pit, dig it out to send him over to your opponent.
- Game ends when someone's timer runs out!
Hints and tidbits:
- Get more treasure after meter is full to send tough rock to you opponent and get more time.
- More tough rock appears the further down you go.
- The timing of when the worm is sent is important!
- I messed up the color coding in some places... Player 1 is on the left, and Player 2 is on the right.
